ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.
M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: How often do the following people treat you unfairly or negatively because of your ethnic background: Teachers?
Notes: 1 = Almost never; 2 = Seldom; 3 = Sometimes; 4 = Often; 5 = Very often

ElementDescription: How often do the following people treat you unfairly or negatively because of your ethnic background: Other adults outside school?
Notes: 1 = Almost never; 2 = Seldom; 3 = Sometimes; 4 = Often; 5 = Very often

ElementDescription: How often do the following people treat you unfairly or negatively because of your ethnic background: Other students?
Notes: 1 = Almost never; 2 = Seldom; 3 = Sometimes; 4 = Often; 5 = Very often

ElementDescription: How often does the following happen: I feel that others behave in an unfair or negative way toward my ethnic group?
Notes: 1 = Almost never; 2 = Seldom; 3 = Sometimes; 4 = Often; 5 = Very often

ElementDescription: Because of my ethnic background: I feel that I am not wanted in American society?
Notes: 1 = Almost never; 2 = Seldom; 3 = Sometimes; 4 = Often; 5 = Very often

ElementDescription: Because of my ethnic background: I don't feel accepted by other Americans?
Notes: 1 = Almost never; 2 = Seldom; 3 = Sometimes; 4 = Often; 5 = Very often

ElementDescription: Because of my ethnic background: I feel that other Americans have something against me?
Notes: 1 = Almost never; 2 = Seldom; 3 = Sometimes; 4 = Often; 5 = Very often

ElementDescription: How often do teachers treat you unfairly or negatively because of your ethnic background?
Notes: 0 = Not at all; 1 = Rarely; 2 = Sometimes; 3 = Often; 4 = Almost always; 8 = Refuse to answer

ElementDescription: How often do people your age treat you unfairly or negatively because of your ethnic background?
Notes: 0 = Not at all; 1 = Rarely; 2 = Sometimes; 3 = Often; 4 = Almost always; 8 = Refuse to answer

ElementDescription: How often do other people (such as police and shopkeepers) treat you unfairly or negatively because of your ethnic background?
Notes: 0 = Not at all; 1 = Rarely; 2 = Sometimes; 3 = Often; 4 = Almost always; 8 = Refuse to answer

ElementDescription: How often do you feel that others behave in an unfair or negative way toward your ethnic group?
Notes: 0 = Not at all; 1 = Rarely; 2 = Sometimes; 3 = Often; 4 = Almost always; 8 = Refuse to answer

ElementDescription: To what extent do you feel that you are not wanted in American society?
Notes: 0 = Not at all; 1 = A little bit; 2 = Sort of; 3 = Pretty much; 4 = Definitely; 8 = Refuse to answer

ElementDescription: To what extent do you feel that you are not accepted by other Americans?
Notes: 0 = Not at all; 1 = A little bit; 2 = Sort of; 3 = Pretty much; 4 = Definitely; 8 = Refuse to answer

ElementDescription: To what extent do you feel that other Americans have something against you?
Notes: 0 = Not at all; 1 = A little bit; 2 = Sort of; 3 = Pretty much; 4 = Definitely; 8 = Refuse to answer
